name: Peaches Stuffed With Toasted Almond Cheese
keywords: almonds, cream cheese, peach, dessert, high fiber

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each peach in half and remove pit. Enlarge the cavity by removing a little of the peach pulp. Reserve pulp for other use (or eat).
Combine cream cheese and almonds and place in the cavity of each peach.
Chill, if desired. But do not serve peaches chilled. For best flavor remove peaches from refrigerator about one hour before serving. Decorate with mint leaves.
